short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant alerts if a flight you've been on has been disrupted and you're owed money.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant alerts if a flight you’ve been on has been disrupted and you’re owed money.

If your flight is ever delayed, cancelled or overbooked, you can claim up to $700 from the airline. Just add the ClaimCompass plugin and it will monitor the flights you buy, automatically notifying you if you’re entitled to some money back.
